verses.3:
Ao no hiseho re; ny tohatra
Mba hanatonako
Ny lanitra
Anjely miantso ahy
Akaikinao ry Ray,
;;;Akaikinao;;;
verses.4:
Ny fahoriana; sy loza koa,
Raha eo anilanao,
Dia mody soa
Koa dia tano aho
Ho ao akaikinao!
;;;Akaikinao;;;
verses.5:
Na dia hilentika; ny androko,
Ary'zao hita izao
Hilaozako,
Mbola ho hirako
Ry Andriamanitro,
;;;Akaikinao;;;
